Actions.Text: Strike+1. Inflict 1 Vulnerable.

Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend.

Actions.Name: Interrupt
Actions.Text: Reaction - Enemy within Range 1 moves. Strike+1 them.

Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Inflict 2 Weak and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Range 3 - all of targets attacks until your next turn or until you are defeated must include you as a target.

Archetypes.Name: Inspiring
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-2} damage. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Strength.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Each ally with Radius 3 gains 2 Haste and 2 Wary.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Defend+1.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Radius 1 - Inflict 2 Slow. Defend.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend+4. Gain {TIR*3} Counter.

Actions.Name: Interrupt
Actions.Text: Reaction - An adjacent enemy moves. Strike them.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 2 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Gain 1 Evasive.

Archetypes.Name: Spellproof
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} block. Choose an element. Gain resistance to that element until your next turn.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Consume up to {TIR} elements.

Passives.Name: Spellproof
Passives.Text: Attacks that have an element cannot ignore this character's block.

Archetypes.Name: Impassible
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. Range 3 - target must attack you if able and can only move closer to you on their next turn.

Passives.Name: Attention drawing
Passives.Text: Zone of control +2.

Archetypes.Name: Coordinated
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-3} damage. If the target is adjacent to your ally, that ally may strike the target.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK-2} Block. An ally within Range 3 gains {BLK-2} Block.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Each ally within Radius 2 may Maneuver. Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Strike. Inflict 1 Slow.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - Inflict {TIR} Slow and {TIR} Soft. Channel Nature.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Channel Water.

Actions.Name: Bodyguard
Actions.Text: Reaction - an adjacent ally is attacked. The Rabble swaps spaces with the ally and takes the attack.

Passives.Name: Group deployment
Passives.Text: {TIR+1} rabble are deployed as one unit, sharing activations but not spaces, statuses or health. When acting, they must all perform the same action.

Passives.Name: Natural powers
Passives.Text: At the end of turn, if Nature is channeled, Inflict {TIR+1} Soft. If Water is channeled, Push {TIR}

Passives.Name: Death so close
Passives.Text: Whenever a Rabble dies, all Rabble within Radius 3 gain 1 Vulnerable.

Archetypes.Name: Roused
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG+1} damage.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. You may Consume Water. If you do, Range +3. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR} Soft. Channel Nature.

Passives.Name: Death so close
Passives.Text: Whenever a Rabble dies, all Rabble within Radius 3 gain 2 Vulnerable, 2 Haste and 2 Strength.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Strike. Consume Light. If you do, inflict {TIR+1} Feeble.

Archetypes.Name: Rife
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage

Passives.Name: Group deployment
Passives.Text: {TIR*2+1} rabble are deployed as one unit, sharing activations but not spaces, statuses or health. When acting, they must all perform the same action.

Archetypes.Name: Ravenous
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage. You may consume Dark. If you do, gain half the damage dealt as barrier.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - Inflict {TIR} Weak and {TIR} Soft. Channel Dark.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Radius 1 - All friendly characters gain {BLK-3} Barrier. If they already have Barrier, they gain 2 extra.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend and gain {BLK-3} Barrier.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place a Screamer.

Passives.Name: Ranged Suppresion
Passives.Text: Attacks against this and adjacent allies originating from Range 3 or greater deal half damage.

Passives.Name: Screamer
Passives.Text: Size 1 obstacle. Has {TIR+3} HP. At the end of each round, Radius 3 - inflict 1 Dazed.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Create a Size 1 obstacle adjacent to you. Defend. Channel Earth.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike. Defend. Consume Dark - Inflict {TIR+1} Bleed and target discards {TIR} cards.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place a Screamer. Channel Dark.

Passives.Name: Screamer
Passives.Text: Size 1 obstacle. Has {TIR+3} HP and {TIR*3} barrier. At the end of each round, Radius 3 - inflict 1 Dazed.

Archetypes.Name: Plotting
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK-1} Block. Radius 3 - each ally may move 1.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Gain {DMG+2} Counter with Range 5.

Actions.Name: Bait
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked by a non-adjacent enemy. Inflict 2 Dazed and 2 Feeble to them.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Strike. Consume Lightning - Strike an enemy within Range 3 of the last target that hasn't been targetted with this action yet. Repeat {TIR} times.

Passives.Name: Charged Screms
Passives.Text: Whenever a Screamer is dealt damage, it deals {TIR} Damage to each enemy within Range 3.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike+1. Inflict {TIR+1} Bleed and gain {DMG} Counter.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR+1} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Defend.

Actions.Name: Riposte
Actions.Text: Reaction - You are attacked from any range. Ignore all damage from dice showing 1 or 2. Deal damage equal to damage ignored back to the attacker.

Passives.Name: Duel
Passives.Text: The last character attacked by Duelist is dueling with it. Enemies dueling deal and take half damage from characters other than the one they are dueling. While the duelist is dueling, it resists all damage from characters it's not dueling.

Actions.Name: Riposte
Actions.Text: Reaction - You or an adjacent character is attacked from any range. Ignore all damage from dice showing 1, 2 or 3. Deal damage equal to damage ignored back to the attacker.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1. Channel Earth.

Passives.Name: Steady as Stone
Passives.Text: Whenever you would be attacked or moved, you may consume Earth. If you do, gain {BLK} block and reduce the movement by {TIR*2}.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike+1. Gain {DMG} Counter. You may consume Lightning. If you do, Strike-2 and gain {DMG} Counter.

Archetypes.Name: Spellweaving
Archetypes.Strike: If there are three or more elements, consume a random element. Your attack deals that type of damage and deals an extra {TIR*2} damage. Deal {DMG} damage.
Archetypes.Maneuver: Move 3. Channel a random unchanneled element.

Passives.Name: Spellsnatch
Passives.Text: Whenever the character you are dueling channels an element, gain {BLK} barrier and deal {DMG-2} damage to them.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Strike+2.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Channel Ice.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Reaction
Actions.Text: An enemy attacks you or an ally within Radius 3. Radius 3 - you and all allies gain {BLK-3} Block. You may consume Light and/or Ice. If Light is consumed, after this attack, inflict {TIR+1} Pulse on the attacker and they may only draw line of sight to adjacent spaces this turn. If Ice is consumed, Defend and inflict {TIR} Slow to the attacker.

Passives.Name: Sentry
Passives.Text: Zone of control +1.

Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Text: Range +{TIR+1}. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR} Slow.

Name: Caster
Strike: Range {TIR*2+1}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {DMG} damage. Ignore Block.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Burst 1. Strike+1.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range + {TIR+1}. Strike-1 up to two targets.

Archetypes.Name: Stormcaller
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+1}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal 2 damage {TIR+1} times. Ignore Block.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 2 - Deal 1 damage. Channel Lightning.

Archetypes.Name: Combustionist
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR+1}. Burst {TIR}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {DMG} damage. Ignore Block.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Burst+1. Strike+1.

Archetypes.Name: Conductive
Archetypes.Defend: Channel any element. Gain barrier equal to the number of elements channeled.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend.

Archetypes.Name: Immortal
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+1}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {DMG-1} damage. Ignore Block. Gain Barrier equal to half the damage dealt.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. Consume any amount of elements - gain {TIR+1} block for each element consumed.

Actions.Name: Persist
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Defend.

Name: Musketman
Strike: Range 10. Spend 1 Ammo to deal {DMG+1} damage or Reload 1.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Choose a target in range. At the start of your next turn, if the target is in range, Strike them dealing double damage.

Passives.Name: Musket
Passives.Text: Starts combat with 1 Ammo and has 1 max Ammo.

Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Range 3 - target gains {BLK} Block. You may consume Ice or Earth. If you do, create a size 1 Obstacle adjacent to the target.

Passives.Name: Death so close
Passives.Text: Whenever a Footman dies, all Footmen within Radius 3 gain 1 Vulnerable.

Passives.Name: Group deployment
Passives.Text: {TIR+1} footmen are deployed as one unit, sharing activations but not spaces, statuses or health. When acting, they must all perform the same action.

Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Text: Maneuver. Each ally with Radius 3 gains 2 Haste and 2 Wary.

Name: Druid
Strike: Summon a Bramble. Deal {DMG-1} damage to each enemy adjacent to it.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 3 - Strike. Channel Nature or Water.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Strike. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison and {TIR} Slow to each enemy adjacent to the Bramble. You may consume Nature and/or Water. If Nature was consumed, inflict another {TIR+1} Poison. If Water was consumed, all spaces within Radius 2 of the Bramble become difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. You may move each Bramble in line of sight 1 space. They exert zone of control until your next turn.

Passives.Name: Bramble
Passives.Text: Size 1 obstacle. Has {TIR+3} HP. Has resistance against damage from non-adjacent sources. Has weakness against Fire and Lightning. Always has {TIR+2} Counter.

Passives.Name: Bramble tender
Passives.Text: Start of combat: place {TIR*2+1} Brambles within Range 7 of the Druid.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Manuever. Range 3 - Strike. You may destroy up to three Brambles. For each one destroyed, deal an additional {TIR} damage. Channel Dark

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Strike. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison to each enemy adjacent to the Bramble. You may Consume Dark and destroy two brambles to double the Poison on each of those enemies.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Summon a Bramle {TIR+1} times. Inflict {TIR} Poison and {TIR} Slow to each enemy adjacent to any of the summoned Brambles.

Archetypes.Name: Healer
Archetypes.Strike: Summon a Bramble. Restore {DMG-1} health to each ally adjacent to it.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Strike. Inflict {TIR} Slow to each enemy adjacent to the Bramble. You may consume Nature and/or Water. If Nature was consumed, each adjacent Ally recovers {DMG-1} Health. If Water was consumed, all spaces within Radius 2 of the Bramble become difficult terrain.

Archetypes.Name: Toxic
Archetypes.Strike: Summon a Bramble. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison to each enemy adjacent to it.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. You may move each Bramble in line of sight 1 space. Inflict {TIR} Poison to each enemy adjacent to a Bramble.

Passives.Name: Toxic Spikes
Passives.Text: Whenever a Bramble deals Counter damage to a character, it also Inflicts {TIR} Poison to that character.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+2. At the start of your next turn, if the target is adjacent to you and Bloodied, inflict 1 Wound.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - target enemy maneuvers to be as close as possible to you. If it becomes adjacent to you, inflict {TIR+1} Slow and Strike them.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend

Passives.Name: Large and Heavy
Passives.Text: Size 2. Reduce all push against the Statue by it's size.

Passives.Name: Chipping
Passives.Text: At the start of your turn, if you're bloodied, gain 1 Haste and 2 Soft.

Name: Hexer
Strike: Range 5. Target exiles 2 non-status cards from their hand. Inflict {DMG} Poison.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Create a three 1 HP Size 1 obstacles in three adjacent spaces.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Strike. Inflict 1 Stunned.

Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend.

Passives.Name: Auto-hex
Passives.Text: When attacked, the attacker exiles 1 non-status card from their hand.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Place a Sapping Pillar.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Place a Chaining Pillar next to the target.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place 3 size 1 obstacles.

Passives.Name: Wall Infusion
Passives.Text: All obstacles within Range 3 of the Inhibitor take {TIR*2+1} less damage.

Passives.Name: Pillar
Passives.Text: All Pillars are Size 1 obstacles. They can be attacked and have {TIR*5+5} HP.

Passives.Name: Sapping Pillar
Passives.Text: Radius 3 - All enemies deal 3 less damage.

Passives.Name: Chaining Pillar
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy starts their turn adjacent to the Chaining Pillar, that turn they may not move to be further than 3 spaces away from that Chaining Pillar unless it is destroyed.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Text: Strike.

Name: Mindmister
Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. When your block is broken, inflict {DMG} Dazed to the character breaking it.

Actions.Name: One
Actions.Text: Strike. Target shuffles their hand and discard into their deck, then draws that many cards. Maneuver-1.

Actions.Name: Many
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Strike and Push 2.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Range+4 - Strike-1 and {DMG} Slow.

Passives.Name: Mist of Mind
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy ends their turn within range 5 of Mindmister, inflict {TIR} Dazed.

Passives.Name: Pain of Clarity
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy within range 5 plays Dazed, they lose {DMG} life.

Passives.Name: Last Breath
Passives.Text: When defeated, perform the Melee action.

Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Text: Strike.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 5 - Target ally Maneuvers and Strikes.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. All allies within Radius 3 may Move 3.

Passives.Name: Gun
Passives.Text: All attacks may gain Range {3+TIR*2}. If they do, they cost 1 Ammo and they deal +2 damage. Starts combat with 3 Ammo and max Ammo 3.

Passives.Name: Officer's Mark
Passives.Text: Marked characters take {TIR+1} extra damage.

Archetypes.Name: Banneret
Archetypes.Strike: Line 2. Deal {DMG} damage.

Passives.Name: Banner
Passives.Text: Allies within Radius 3 deal {TIR+1} more damage and take {TIR+1} less damage.

Passives.Name: Legacy
Passives.Text: When Officer is defeated, place a Size 1 obstacle in its space. It has all the effects of “Banner”.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 5 - Target ally loses {TIR*2} life, gains 2 Strength and 1 Haste, Maneuvers and Strikes.

Passives.Name: Cursed Bullets
Passives.Text: Attacks consuming ammo inflict 2 Dazed and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. All allies within Radius 3 may Move 3 and gain {TIR*4} Barrier.

Actions.Name: Protect our own
Actions.Text: Reaction - an ally within range 3 is attacked. That ally gains {TIR*4} Block and you may Strike the attacker.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - mark target. For each marked enemy, an ally may strike that enemy.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - each ally may Move 2 and Strike an Obstacle.

Name: Arcanist
Strike: Deal {DMG-1} damage. If the target is inside a Circle, deal that damage {TIR} more times.

Actions.Name: Bind
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Deploy a Binding Circle.

Actions.Name: Embolbolden
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Deploy an Emboldening Circle.

Actions.Name: Invigorate
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Deploy an Invigorating Circle.

Passives.Name: Circles
Passives.Text: All Circles are Radius 3 terrain. They can be attacked at the center and have {TIR*5+5} HP.

Passives.Name: Binding Circle
Passives.Text: At the start of their turn, inflict 1 Slowed and deal {DMG} damage to each enemy within this Circle.

Passives.Name: Emboldening Circle
Passives.Text: At the start of their turn, each ally within this Circle gains 3 Strength for that turn and {BLK} Block.

Passives.Name: Invigorating Circle
Passives.Text: At the start of their turn, each ally within this Circle gains 3 Haste for that turn and recovers {TIR} HP.

Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Text: Strike.

Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Channel Fire or Ice. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison and {TIR+1} Strength.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 5 - Target character gains {BLK-1} Block, {TIR+1} Strength and {TIR+1} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Consume Fire and/or Ice. Burst 3 - Strike-1 of the consumed elements type. If Fire was consumed, inflict {TIR+1} Burn to each enemy. If Ice was consumed, each ally gains {BLK-1} Block.

Passives.Name: Blood scream
Passives.Text: When bloodied for the first time, Channel Fire or Ice and inflict {TIR} Dazed to each enemy within line of sight.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Inflict 2 Weak and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Range 3 - all of targets attacks until your next turn or until you are defeated must include you as a target.

Archetypes.Name: Inspiring
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-2} damage. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Strength.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Each ally with Radius 3 gains 2 Haste and 2 Wary.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend+1.

Actions.Name: Dance
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. An ally may perform an action.

Actions.Name: Perform
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Radius 3 - Each ally gains 2 Haste.

Passives.Name: Retaliation
Passives.Text: After being attacked, any ally within line of sight may attack the attacker if able.

Name: Illuminator
Strike: Range 3 - Deal {DMG} Light damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Pulse.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Maneuver. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Allies gain {TIR+2} Barrier. Inflict {TIR+2} Pulse. Enemies may not draw line of sight further than their Pulse value until the end of their turn.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Teleport to be adjacent to an ally. That ally gains {BLK+1} Block. You may consume Light. If you do, Radius 5 - inflict {DMG+1} Pulse.

Actions.Name: Illumination
Actions.Text: Allies may draw line of sight, but not range, from you.

Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Air damage. Consume Air - inflict {TIR+1} Bleed.

Passives.Name: Like the shadows
Passives.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Consume Dark - Teleport 3. Ignore all efects of the triggering attack.

Archetypes.Name: Patient
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-3} damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Passives.Name: The long fight
Passives.Text: Whenever your evasive is triggered, inflict {TIR} Poison to the attacker.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Line +2. Strike+1. Move to the end of the line. Channel Air.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1 dealing Light damage instead. You may consume Air or Light. If Air was consumed, choose an enemy within Range 3 of the target and deal {DMG-1} Air damage. Then move to any space within Range 2 of the second target. If Light was consumed, you and an ally within Range 2 gain {BLK} Barrier and reduce any number of conditions on both of you by {TIR+1}.

Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Channel Light. Defend.
